creditline: Gift of David and Ruth Waterbury in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: rounded lozenge-shaped sculpture; four wedges with slightly bumpy texture, in black, with cross-shaped cut-away elements between them; raised pile-like texture at cross-shaped element, slightly deeper at center; light colored wood patina
marks: Signature and Sticker on underside, in incised: [TH (monogram)]
title: Ringed Series
